Sections.Text: It takes a certain type of brave, slightly suicidal person to trespass in Tyree Manse. It would take a total madman to enter alone. Most intruders enter the house in sets of three.
Each Intruder has his or her own, unique capabilites, but all of them are controlled in a very similar manner.

In this tutorial you will play three Intruders. An Occultist specializing in ranged attacks, a Ghost Hunter with melee attacks, and a Teen with both ranged and melee as well as psychic abilities that can aid her allies.
Your three Intruders will start the game near the entrance to Tyree Manse.
You can select which unit to use first by either clicking on them or using the Arrow buttons to switch between them. The Tab key also switches between units.
Each unit has a number of Action Points (Ap) that limit how much it can do in a turn.
To select an action, either press the number key assigned to it in the Action Display (1 for Move) or click on the action in the display.
Selecting Move will let you trace a path for your unit to move, shown with bright red circles. Dim circles represent spaces that are beyond your range this turn.
Click on the bright red circle you wish to move to.
Notice that the the Action Display indicates how much AP your current Move action will cost.
Move any one of your Intruders to the red circle to continue the tutorial. Click End Turn to start a new turn if you are out of AP.
